```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# read in the data
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

``````{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
ces %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "Percentage of Population White",
       y = "CalEnvrioScreen 3.0 Score",
       title = "Aggregate CalEnviroScreen 3.0 scores versus percent population identifying \n as white") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "darkorchid4", high = "magenta") +
  theme_minimal()
```
